item.title: Eurobot 2011 :robot:
item.description: Since 1998, Eurobot is an international robotics contest. The photo below shows the robot built in 2011 with the robotics club of INSA Toulouse. A simulator was developed to test the robot strategies : Your browser does not support the HTML5 Video element. The following video is a nice match of the robot : Your browser does not support the HTML5 Video element.
